title: Have you ever completely lost faith only to have it prove you wrong?
body: I ordered Madrinas coffee because shilling is an effective marketing strategy and the first time I got my order in 2 days. The next time I ordered it on november 27th. I got the order today. I thought they just forgot. I even emailed the company. Apparently there was some major plant issue and production halted. They sent me a $30 off code to use with my next order... I never thought it would come and i gave up hoping but against all odds it was on my porch this morning. Sometimes life is good.
